lines.text:
[to bartender]
Give me a coke, okay?
Look, kid, if you want to have any fun at all in this town, you're gonna have to buy something stronger than Coca-Cola.
I'm Inga Koerner. I write for the Globus, a German news weekly.
I smelled it! You work for a rotten sheet, lady!
I guess I'm a little nervous about how this will look on my record.

[Slams coffee pot down on table]
Record! I've seen it. It's enough to gag a hyena. Personally I hate your guts, but I have to defend you.

[to Frank]
Don't try to prove you're a man to me. Prove it to the girl. Don't you know she loves you? Take her and leave this town, as quick as you can, and never come back!
This is no cross-examination! It's a circus!
